org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.core.network.event

Class NetworkEventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.integrateddynamics.core.network.event.NetworkEventBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INetworkEventBus

    public class NetworkEventBus
extends java.lang.Object
implements INetworkEventBus
    An event bus for INetwork events where INetworkElement instances can listen to. Partially based on Minecraft Forge's EventBus implementation.
